title: LUNAR GUARDIAN WARWICK Blood Scent Bug!!!
body:
Hi the blood scent is bugged without a doubt on the new warwick skin. Whenever i scent someone i see a trail, however, the trail becomes disconnected most of the time half way. Someone would have like 10% hp and trigger my blood scent, i follow it, it it stops midway. Then i zoom over to the low hp champ thats marks and around him theres no trail, just a mark on top of his head. Never had this problem with other warwick skins.

ALSO on a side note, for the part of the trail thats actually visible, since scent is trail is yellow its a bit harder to see than red, it blends into the ground. Can you guys make it a bit more easier to see pls, such as adding darker border or making it brighter?

Hey Stealth Panda,
Thanks for the report! Currently looking into this.

**Edit**: We've identified the issue and are working on a fix.
**Edit 2**: We have a potential fix, it's in testing - will be following up in the AM. 
**Edit 3**: Continuing testing.
**Edit 4:** Change has been pushed to live as a hotfix.

Thanks for your patience in all of this. <3
